channel.title: Help please
channel.description:
Hey, ummm I keep getting this error when I'm on my server. My client crashes when I click on minimap etc.
[code]java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 1 at Class36.methodCustomAnimations(Class36.java:65) at Animation.unpackConfig(Animation.java:1710) at client.startUp(client.java:7492) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:33) at client.run(client.java:4686) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) NPC.DAT : 1489108188 Called method225 NPC.IDX : 1489126980 Called method225 Error: T1 - 123,0 - 36,36 2 2 # # A fatal error has been detected by the Java Runtime Environment: # # EXCEPTION_ACCESS_VIOLATION (0xc0000005) at pc=0x000000006d841d76, pid=4712, t id=2020 # # JRE version: 6.0_15-b03 # Java VM: Java HotSpot(TM) 64-Bit Server VM (14.1-b02 mixed mode windows-amd64 ) # Problematic frame: # V [jvm.dll+0x51d76] # # An error report file with more information is saved as: # C:\Users\Baltazar\Desktop\EvoScape User Client V1\hs_err_pid4712.log # # If you would like to submit a bug report, please visit: # http://java.sun.com/webapps/bugreport/crash.jsp # Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
Help please. :)

item.title: Help please
item.dc:creator: @xEvo Exion
item.description:
@xEvo wrote:

Hey, ummm I keep getting this error when I’m on my server. My client crashes when I click on minimap etc.

[code]java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 1
at Class36.methodCustomAnimations(Class36.java:65)
at Animation.unpackConfig(Animation.java:1710)
